content.text:
I just finished packing! Anything I'm missing? I'm so excited, only 23 hours until we fly out of PDX!

## Wearing

- Shoes
- Mid-length socks
- Jeans
- Undershirt
- Flannel button-down
- Compressible insulated jacket (puffy)
- Hat
- Backpack (17 L)
- Phone + wallet + keys
- Passport

## Clothing

- Mid-length socks
- Low-cut socks
- Underwear
- Undershirts
- Running shorts
- Swimming shorts
- Casual + swim shorts
- Button-down shirts
- Trousers
- Long underwear
- Rain jacket
- Beanie

## Electronics

- Laptop
- Mouse
- Flashlight
- 18650 Batteries
- USB cables and adapters
- Arch Linux recovery SD card
- Over-the-ear headphones
- Beard trimmer (need a transformer)

## Toiletries

- Deodorant
- Toothbrush
- Towel
- Floss

## Misc

- Earplugs
- Inflatable pillow
- Sunglasses
- Board games
- Pen
- Notepad
- Book
- Water bottle

## In [@kathleen](@GSuGLzJa8t3aJCLvs66Ekn7MXdr3yqCSzsd6z2iUEBY=.ed25519)'s checked bag

- Toothpaste
- Soap
- Sunscreen
- Lip balm

## Pics!

![Photo of the contents of my bag organized on a rug in the living room](&zr9fk8QtHk4CImZaobx09KnEz9WqVDMExU9AFB/QBtU=.sha256)

![Photo of my bag packed and sitting on a rug in the living room](&qEDzBg3zLR/Xyzdkece87Bz1cphzg8uJAUqgG+K1Zc8=.sha256)

I don't have much extra room, but I've got an outside cinch pocket that I can use in case I need to stuff in anything extra.
